oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CORE Organic News No. 1. May 2005
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Andreasen, Information manager Claus Bo
Ullvén, Information manager Karin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
The CORE Organic newsletter
The objective of the CORE Organic newsletter is to inform about the outcome and the activities within the CORE Organic project.
The newsletter includes articles on the project deliverables, including new publications, news on databases, mapping, workshops, conferences etc.
In most issues there will be a "country profile", which focus on organisation of research, research programmes, institutes etc in a specific country. Partners will produce their own country profile.
Finally, each partner country has the opportunity of using the newsletter to inform about national research activities
The newsletter will from May 2005 be issued four times annually.
